summary: A psychotherapist has nightmares and sinister visions. Ghosts? Is it more than his daughter's death causing this? He returns to his childhood home and dad to put things to rest.
cast: Adrien Brody|Jenni Baird|Bruce Spence|Greg Poppleton|Barbara Gouskos|Jill McKay|Sam Neill|Anna Lise Phillips|Chloe Bayliss|Emma O'Farrell|Malcolm Kennard|Matthew Sunderland|George Shevtsov|Robin McLeavy|Jesse Hyde|Alexander McGuire|Michael Whalley|Brooke Alyse|Alison Benstead|Emily Bevel|Adrienne Brown|Jeanette Cronin|Charlotte Graham|Ella Hattenfels|Rowan Moses|Lilly Orrell|Suzie Steen|Kirsti Swanson
keywords: train tracks|repressed memory|train derailment|female police officer|memory
title: Backtrack: Sin regreso
